title: Unit 10: Communication - Comprehensive Test
description: Test de vocabulario y expresiones conversacionales sobre comunicación, tecnología y conversaciones telefónicas

questions.question: What do you use to power your phone when the battery is low?
Traduce: '¿Podría hablar con Angela, por favor?'
questions.answer: Could I speak to Angela, please?

questions.question: Video calling is _____ convenient than regular mail.
When you want to politely interrupt a conversation, you can say:
Instant messaging (IM) is faster than regular mail.
What does 'You're breaking up' mean during a phone call?
What were we talking _____? I forgot.
Traduce: 'Es difícil contactarte.'
questions.answer: It's hard to get ahold of you

questions.question: Spam refers to unwanted electronic messages.
Which expression shows surprise about something good happening?
Traduce: 'Enviamos mensajes de texto para mantenernos en contacto.'
questions.answer: We text to keep in touch

questions.question: I was _____ calling to ask about the meeting.
When you want to give your opinion in formal writing, you start with:
Traduce: 'Las videoconferencias son más eficientes que las llamadas regulares.'
questions.answer: Video conferencing is more efficient than regular calls
